import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Payment = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const goBack = () => { navigate(-1); }; const handlePayment = () => { setIsLoading(true); setTimeout(() => { setIsLoading(false); navigate("/room/id/payment/success"); }, 3000); // Simulate a 3-second delay for the payment process }; return ( <>

Payment

Pay With

{/* Card Option */}
handlePaymentOptionSelect("card")} >
{/* PayPal Option (Disabled) */}
{/* Apple Pay Option (Disabled) */}

Coming Soon...

{/* Card Details (Initially Hidden) */}

Your personal data will be used to process your order, support your experience throughout this website, and for other purposes described in our privacy policy.
